message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $180. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Is that something you'd be willing to accept?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $120 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $160.  This product is truly worth it, and I believe you'll get a lot of value from it.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Is that something you'd be willing to accept?
